text: Holzminden is a district in Lower Saxony, Germany. The district is located in the Weserbergland mountains. The Weser River forms the southwestern border of the district. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden #Holzminden Free municipalities #Delligsen *1. Bevern # Bevern1 # Golmbach # Holenberg # Negenborn *2. Bodenwerder-Polle # Bodenwerder1, 2 # Brevörde # Halle # Hehlen # Heinsen # Heyen # Kirchbrak # Ottenstein # Pegestorf # Polle # Vahlbruch *3. Boffzen # Boffzen1 # Derental # Fürstenberg # Lauenförde *4.
